content.query:
DROP EXTERNAL TABLE Addresses;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Addresses (
	[AddressID] nvarchar(256),
	[CustomerID] nvarchar(256),
	[AddressLine1] nvarchar(256),
	[AddressLine2] nvarchar(256),
	[City] nvarchar(256),
	[State] nvarchar(256),
	[ZipCode] nvarchar(256),
	[CreatedDate] date,
	[UpdatedDate] date,
	[DataSourceId] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Addresses',
	DATA_SOURCE = [silver_southridgedatalake01_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.Addresses
GO
